sentences.sContent: This course embraces several different aspects of psychology.
sentences.sCn: 这门课程涉及心理学的几个不同方面。

sentences.sContent: ...but they have little choice but to embrace university and the student debt that comes with it...
...are learning to embrace the technologies as enabling rather than disrupting...
...to a hearty embrace of fake science...
...but the United States is unlikely to fully embrace the Swedish model...
...His logic: companies that embrace automation might use fewer workers...
...credits this younger generation's political strength to their embrace of technology...

words.tran: 拥抱，包含（embrace的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to include something as part of a subject, discussion etc
